body.name: R-Tech 2MP TVI Turret Dome Camera with Matrix IR Night Vision, 4-inch Security Analog Camera, IP 67 Outdoor Weatherproof, Full Metal Housing, 4-in-1 AHD/CVBS/CVI/TVI - 2.8mm Fixed Lens
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 1 hr 2 mins
features: [Overview]: Experience the superior clarity of R-tech’s 2 Megapixels high definition 4-in-1 camera for vast coverage and superior image details. This home-grown ISP features the latest image processing algorithms and is optimized for surveillance camera operations.

[Specs]: 1080P (2MP) High Resolution 1/3" CMOS Sensor for (TVI/AHD/CVI/Analog) DVRs, High-Intensity Matrix IR LED for Night Vision up to 50m (164ft), 2.8mm Fixed Wide Angle Lens for Crystal Clear Focus - No Adjustment Required.

[Wide Angle]: The camera uses a progressive-scan CMOS sensor and next-generation ISP chip technology developed by R-tech to deliver stunning video with a wide field of view. This home-grown ISP features the latest image processing algorithms and is optimized for surveillance camera operations.

[Night Vision]: With IR illumination, detailed images can be captured in low light or total darkness. The camera’s integrated infrared illumination provides high-performance in extreme low-light environments up to 164 ft.

[For Both Indoor & Outdoor]: With a built-in heater and a temperature range of –40 °F to +140 °F, the camera is designed for extreme temperature environments. The IP67 rating makes it suitable for demanding outdoor applications.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good cam for the price
reviews.reviewText: Although not the quality of my $99 cameras, this one does quite well for the price. Decent resolution and sees well in the dark. Ones who complain about the "hard setup" with the DIP switches....it takes 30 seconds to figure out which setting to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good option

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It has a flicker but that doesn't stop the good.
reviews.reviewText: I'm always looking for improvements and when one of my other cameras died and I needed a replacement, I bought several of these cameras just in case others needed replacing. After seeing the wide field of view and clarity of this camera, I decided to replace a perfectly good Swann camera as well. This camera covers the same area that would've required two cameras several years ago.I love the turret design, it looks and feels like it should cost at least twice the price. The night vision is excellent. Where I used to use an IR illuminator array to help the previous cameras, this camera really lights up the area for several dozen feet. Only the far reaches of my back yard, almost 100ft way, are dark.My only gripe is there is this constant flicker on one of the cameras where it switches between day and night during the daytime every so often . If it wasn't for this issue, this would be an awesome, 5 star camera. I've included a couple videos of the flickering. Because of this flicker, I'm not sure how much I can trust the motion detection.Overall, a very solid camera for a steal of a price. I probably would've only purchased one if the price wasn't right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I see you!!!!
reviews.reviewText: This camera is great. It has the same quality of the Georgia video that captured the boxes of ballots being pulled from underneath the tables once all the observers were send home. If you seen the footage it’s the same quality. Would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great upgrade for the price
reviews.reviewText: Screenshot at 9pm from my new security camera. All metal. Easy install. Easy to adjust. Wide angle as you can see in the picture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent band for the dollar
reviews.reviewText: I needed an analog camera for a legacy Aiphone installation. I wanted something that looked liked the newer Turret camera style and ran off of 12v DC. This camera worked perfectly and was super easy to configure (dip switches). I would buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Play back is awful!
reviews.reviewText: This camera has a good daytime picture and a decent nighttime picture. But if you use it view footage that was recorded already, pass on this camera. The video will look like crap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Cumple con todo lo ofrecido sea día o noche lo único es que hubiese tenido audio pero se merece un 5
